text:
Hi, I'm trying to sort the posts on blog listing with contents|sort(false, false, 'publish_date/alphabetical/so on)  and I'm using a simple pagination.

The problem is that it doesn't sort all blog posts and paginate accordingly. For example, I have page 1 with posts from 2020 to 2021 ordered by date, on page 2 I have posts from 2018 to 2019 ordered by date and so on. It seems like it only sorts the posts on the current page not the entire loop. Am I missing something?
Hello. Is there any way to remove the theme.json from a project?
Hello, I am new here, I was wondering if anyone had experience with integrating clear care, to HubSpot. (<https://www.clearcareonline.com/>)
